title: Smart Data Models - LoadComposite
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This models combines static load and induction motor load effects. The dynamics of the motor are simplified by linearizing the induction machine equations.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be LoadComposite

epfd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active load-frequency dependence index (dynamic) (Epfd).  Typical Value = 1.5. Default: 0.0

epfs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active load-frequency dependence index (static) (Epfs).  Typical Value = 1.5. Default: 0.0

epvd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active load-voltage dependence index (dynamic) (Epvd).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

epvs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active load-voltage dependence index (static) (Epvs).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

eqfd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive load-frequency dependence index (dynamic) (Eqfd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

eqfs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive load-frequency dependence index (static) (Eqfs).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

eqvd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive load-voltage dependence index (dynamic) (Eqvd).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

eqvs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive load-voltage dependence index (static) (Eqvs).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

h.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inertia constant (H).  Typical Value = 2.5. Default: 0

lfrac.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Loading factor - ratio of initial P to motor MVA base (Lfrac).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

pfrac.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of constant-power load to be represented by this motor model (Pfrac) (>=0.0 and <=1.0).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0
